meanings.definition: To scan (a document or image) using a camera or scanner to create a digital copy.
meanings.sent1: I photoscanned the old family photos to keep them safe.
meanings.sent2: She photoscanned the important documents for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The detective photoscanned the evidence to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: Her memory photoscanned every detail of the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The artist photoscanned the landscape to capture its beauty.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a digital copy of a document or image using a camera or scanner.
meanings.sent1: The photoscanned image looked just like the original painting.
meanings.sent2: He kept a record of all the photoscanned documents.
meanings.sent3: The photoscanned copy made it easy to share the information.
meanings.sent4: The photoscanned version of the map was clearer than the original.
meanings.sent5: The photoscanned photo album was a great way to preserve memories.
